DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_ACTIVITY" ( "INSPECTION_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "ACTIVITY_ID" VARCHAR2(10 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "EXTENSION_ID" NUMBER, CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_ACTIVITY_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("INSPECTION_ID", "ACTIVITY_ID") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_DICTIONARY" ( "TEST_ID" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "FIELD_ALIGNMENT" NUMBER, "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "DATATYPE" VARCHAR2(15 BYTE), "UOM" VARCHAR2(10 BYTE), "REQUIRED" VARCHAR2(1 BYTE), "SELECT_LIST_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "VISIBLE" VARCHAR2(1 BYTE), "EXTENSION_ID" NUMBER, "FIELD_WIDTH" NUMBER, "FIELD_MAX_CHARS" NUMBER, CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("TEST_ID") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_DICTIONARY_GROUP" ( "GROUP_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "TEST_ID" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "ACCESS" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_DICTIONARY_GROUP_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("GROUP_ID", "TEST_ID") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_EXTENSION" ( "EXTENSION_ID" NUMBER NOT NULL ENABLE, "LINKED_TABLE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "FIELDNAME" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "VALUE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_EXTENSION_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("EXTENSION_ID", "LINKED_TABLE", "FIELDNAME") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_INSPECTION" ( "INSPECTION_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "EXTENSION_ID" NUMBER, "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_INSPECTION_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("INSPECTION_ID") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_RESULT" ( "SAMPLE_ID" NUMBER NOT NULL ENABLE, "TEST_ID" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "VALUE" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "UPDATED" DATE, "USER_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "STATUS" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "PROCESSED" DATE, CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_RESULT_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("SAMPLE_ID") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_SAMPLE" ( "SAMPLE_ID" NUMBER NOT NULL ENABLE, "INSPECTION_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "ACTIVITY_ID" VARCHAR2(10 BYTE), "SAMPLE_DATE" DATE, "USER_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "USER_DATA_1" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "USER_DATA_2" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "MATERIAL" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE), "PROCESS_ORDER" VARCHAR2(10 BYTE), CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_SAMPLE_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("SAMPLE_ID") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_SELECTLIST" ( "SELECT_LIST_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "VALUE" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "DESCRIPTION" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "SEQUENCE" NUMBER, CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("SELECT_LIST_ID", "VALUE") ENABLE )

CREATE TABLE "APP_QM_TEST" ( "INSPECTION_ID" VARCHAR2(20 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "ACTIVITY_ID" VARCHAR2(10 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "TEST_ID" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, "SEQUENCE_ID" NUMBER, "EXTENSION_ID" NUMBER, CONSTRAINT "APP_QM_TEST_PK" PRIMARY KEY ("INSPECTION_ID", "ACTIVITY_ID", "TEST_ID") ENABLE )
